price: 71. Ma jirona mid idinka mid ah oo aan dul mareyn (Naarta) korkeeda; kani waa Guddoon  Rabbigaa waajib ah xukman.
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
